docs.title: 🦠🧬💻 Project Title
docs.text:
This repository contains scripts and additional data for XYZ.

The manuscript can be found at

Title B Baggins, G The Gray bioRxiv 202X.Y; doi: https://doi.org/XYZ

docs.title: Repository organization
docs.text:
[project root]
├─ step1.rmd      # individual analysis steps
├─ step2.rmd
├─ data           # contains additional and generated data
│  ├─ data.csv
│  ├─ ...
├─ figures        # generated figures
│  ├─ fig1.png
│  └─ ...
└─ docs
   ├─ step1.html  # rendered and executed notebooks
   └─ step2.html

docs.title: Setup and installation
docs.text:
You will need a working miniforge or miniconda to start. You can follow the installation instructions here. After create an environment with the included conda environment file.

Start by cloning the repository and cd-ing into it.

git clone https://github.com/dienerlab/template
cd template

conda env create -f conda.yml

After that activate the environment.

conda activate template

docs.title: Getting help
docs.text:
For bug reports or feature request please submit an issue.

For general questions or getting help you can open a discussion topic.
